lead_paragraph: More than 450 people have been infected by the disease since December, the World Health Organization said, and there is a global vaccine shortage.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Angola: Yellow Fever Outbreak Kills 178

snippet: More than 450 people have been infected by the disease since December, the World Health Organization said, and there is a global vaccine shortage.
abstract: World Health Organization reports that more than 450 people in Angola have developed yellow fever since December 2015, with 178 deaths.
